item.title: Blogging with Hugo, Julia, Weave.jl
item.description: I have made a PR to Weave.jl which Matti Pastell kindly merged recently. This allows a relatively smooth workflow for blogging using the static website generator Hugo, and generating some pages with plots and evaluated Julia results.
